21955.「……<pc>さん。\n ついに このときが来てしまいましたね。\n 天魔クァバ:
...<pc>. At last, the time has come.
Time for Kukulkannibal's revival...

21957.「諸君！ 天魔復活のときが ついに迫った！\n これより 天魔クァバルナを封印す:
Gentlemen! The time of the demon revival is finally upon us! From now on, I will give you the details of the operation to seal off
Kukulkannibal!

21958.「まず 我らが目指すは ザグバン丘陵の\n 南西に位置する ザグビナ遺構！\n:
First, we are heading for the Zagbina Remains,
located southwest of the Zagban Hills! This is
the place of the demon revival!

21959.「作戦は 以前の通り 変更はない！: The plan is the same as before, no changes!

21960.「復活したクァバルナを 死の淵に追いやり\n ゼキルの聖杭を やつの胸に 突き立:
I will send the resurrected Kukulkannibal back to his death, and drive Zekir's Holy Stake into his chest! If I accomplish this, the
sealing of the Heavenly Demon will be complete!

21961.「それでは 各自の行動を指示するので\n 心して 聞くように！:
Now, I'm going to tell you what to do, so
listen carefully!

21962.「王立騎士団の者は 準備が整い次第\n 天魔復活の地 ザグビナ遺構に向かってほし:
I want all members of the Royal Guard to proceed to the demon revival site, Zagbina Remains, as soon as they are ready! When he
appears, begin the attack!

21963.「<pc>さんは モガレ修道院で\n 完成したゼキルの聖杭を 受け取ってから\n:
<pc> please pick up the completed
Zekir's Holy Stake at Mogare Monastery and
then come to Zagbina Remains!

21964.「よいか！？ 王立騎士団の者は\n <pc>さんが 到着するまで\n やつの体力:
Are you ready? The men of the Royal Guard must
keep him as weak as possible until the
<pc> arrives!

21965.「そして 私は 作戦を統括する者として\n ただちに 天魔復活の地を目指す！\n:
And I, as the man in charge of the operation, will immediately set out for the place of demon revival! If something unusual happens,
I'll let you know!

21966.「作戦は 以上である！\n 全員 理解したか？\n <pc>さん 大丈夫ですか？:
That's all for now! Everybody understand?
<pc>, are you all right?<yesno><close>

21967.「……わかりました。\n それでは <pc>さんのために\n もういちど 説明し:
...Okay, I see what you mean. Now let me
explain again for <pc>.

21968.「……では ラミザ王子。\n 戦いに出る 戦士たちに向かって\n 最後に ひと言:
Prince Ramiza. I ask you to say one last word
to the warriors who are about to go to battle.

21969.「え？ そんな いきなり……？\n こ 困ったな……。:
What? That's out of the blue...? I'm in
trouble...

21970.「ラミザ王子。あなたの思っていることを\n そのまま クチにすれば いいのです。:
Prince Ramiza. You should just say what you
think is right.

21972.「……ボクたちは 今 試されている。\n この危機から ドルワームを救いだせる\:
We are now being tested. Do we have what it
takes to save Dolworm from this crisis?

21973.「だが ここにいるドゥラくんのおかげで\n ボクらは 事前に 策を講じることがで:
But thanks to Mr. Dura here, we were able to
take precautions. I'm sure it will work out.

21974.「……みんな 行こう。\n ドルワームの平和を… 家族を 友達を……\n その:
Let's go, everyone. For Peace in Dolworm, for
my family, for my friends, for all of it!

21975.「それでは 以上をもって\n 今回の軍議は 閉会とする！\n 各自 全力で 作戦:
With that, this session is adjourned! I urge
each and every one of you to execute the
mission to the best of your ability!

21976.「……では ラミザ王子。\n 私は ひと足先に 復活の地に向かいます。:
Well, Prince Ramiza. I'm going to the place of
the Resurrection.

21979.「ドゥラくんっ！？\n ど どうしたの！？ 顔色が悪いよ！: Dura! What's wrong? You look pale!

21980.「もしかして ドゥラくん……。\n やっぱり クァバルナの呪いに……。:
Dura... perhaps you're still under the curse
of Quabaluna...

21982.「ですが ご心配なく…… ラミザ王子。\n 今は クァバルナを封印することだけを:
But don't worry Prince Ramiza. For now, your
only concern is to seal Quabarna...

21983.「クァバルナさえ 封印されれば……。\n 呪いは 解けるのですから……。:
For as long as Quabarna is sealed the curse
can be lifted.

21984.「それでは…… <pc>さん。\n ゼキルの聖杭を モガレ修道院に取りにいく件\:
Well then... <pc>. Please take care
of the matter of getting Zekir's Holy Stake to
Mogare Monastery.

21985.「ドゥラくんは やっぱり\n クァバルナの呪いに かかってたんだ……。\n それ:
Dura must have been under the curse of Quabarna... and yet he had been forced to do all this time... and now he's back to his old
self...

21986.「本人は 大丈夫だって言ってたけど\n クァバルナを封印しないと\n ドゥラくん:
He said he's fine, but if he doesn't seal the
quabaluna, Dura might die...

21987.「<pc>さん。\n 絶対に この作戦を成功させましょう！\n ドゥラくんを 救:
<pc>. We must make this mission work!
We need to save Mr. Dura!

21988.「お待ちしておりました <pc>さん。\n おあずかりしていた ゼキルの聖杭が\:
We have been waiting for you . The Zekir's Holy Stake, which we have been entrusted to you, has been completed as you
see it.

21989.「察するところ…… まさに今\n このゼキルの聖杭が ご入り用のようですね。\n:
Let me guess... you are in need of this very
Zekir's Holy Stake right now. At last, the
Demon Kukulkannibal will be Demon Revived...

21990.「……<pc>さん。\n 私は ゼキルの聖杭を 仕上げた者として\n その戦いを:
...<pc>. I, as the finisher of
Zekir's Holy Stake, want to see that fight
through.

21991.「お願いいたします。\n 私を その天魔復活の地 ザグビナ遺構まで\n 連れてい:
I beg you. Would you please take me to that
demon revival place, Zagbina Remains?<yesno><close>

21992.「あら まあ。\n 私のことを 気づかっていただけたのかしら？\n あなたは 本:
Oh, my. Did you notice me? You really are a
kind-hearted person.

21993.「けれど ご心配なく。\n 私は 封印の瞬間を 見届けるだけですから。:
But don't worry. I will only witness the
moment of sealing.

21994.「ありがとうございます <pc>さん。\n それでは ゼキルの聖杭は このまま\:
Thank you <pc>. I will take Zekir's
Holy Stake as is, then.

21995.「ザグビナ遺構は ラニアッカ断層帯を\n 南西に抜けた先にある ザグバン丘陵に\:
The Zagbina Remains are located in the Zagban
Hills, just southwest of the Raniakka Fault
Zone. Let's go.

21996.「<pc>さん。\n 私は ゼキルの聖杭を 仕上げた者として\n その戦いを 見:
<pc>. I, as the finisher of Zekir's
Holy Stake, want to see that fight through.

21997.「ゼキルの聖杭は 私が持っていきますので\n 天魔クァバルナ復活の地 ザグビナ遺:
I will take Zekir's Holy Stake and you will
take me to Zagbina Remains, the place of Demon
Kukulkannibal Revive.

21998.「ザグビナ遺構は ラニアッカ断層帯を\n 南西に抜けた先にある ザグバン丘陵に\:
The Zagbina Remains are located in the Zagban
Hills, just southwest of the Raniakka Fault
Zone. Let's go.

21999.「どうしたことだ！\n ドゥラ院長の姿が ないぞ！:
What's going on? Director Dura is nowhere to
be found!

22000.「<cs_pchero>さん！ 大変です！\n 先に ドルワームを出たはずなのに:
<cs_pchero>! Oh my God! I thought we left
Dolworm first, but Dura hasn't arrived yet!

22001.「もしかして……\n クァバルナの呪いに 今もどこかで\n 苦しめられているんじ:
Maybe... the curse of Quavarna is still
tormenting him somewhere...

22004.「ククク……。\n 我ハ 死の淵ヨリ 何度でモ よみがえル。\n 会いたかったゾ:
Yori, I will rise again and again from the
depths of death. I have missed you, people of
Dolworm.

22005.「ずいぶン あがいたようダガ……\n 貴様ラ 呪われシ民ハ\n こノ絶望の連鎖カ:
You have struggled so much but your cursed
people cannot escape this chain of despair.

22007.「孤独…… 悔恨… 呪詛… 怨嗟。\n さあ 絶望ノすべてヲ 見せてやロウ。:
Loneliness... regret... Curse...
vindictiveness. Come on, I'll show you all the
despair.

22008.「ラミザ様ッ！ ご決断をッ！\n 司令塔の ドゥラ院長が いない今\n 退却は:
Lady Ramiza! Make a decision! Retreating now,
without Director Dura in command, is not a
shameful act!

22009.「……ダメだ！\n ここで 逃げるわけにはいかない！:
No, no, no, no, no! We can't just run away
here!

22010.「皆 武器を取れ！ ドルワームの未来は\n ボクらの手で 守るんだ！:
Everyone take up arms! The future of Dolworm
is in our hands!

22011.「ククク……。\n ふたたビ 死地ヲ 訪れるとハ\n よほド 絶望ノ世界に 魅入:
Kukuku... If you visit the place of death, you
will find yourself in a world of despair.

22012.「ならバ 今一度 見せてやロウ。\n 絶望ノすべてヲナ……。:
Then let me show you once again. All of
despair...

22014.「<cs_pchero>さん！ 今です！\n 今こそ ゼキルの聖杭で\n クァバ:
<cs_pchero>! Now! Now is the time to seal
the quabarna with Zekir's Holy Stake!

22016.「ゼキルの聖杭なら ここですよ。: Zekir's Holy Stake is in this place.

22017.「あ あなたが マザー・ヘレナですね！\n さあ そのゼキルの聖杭で 天魔クァバ:
Oh, you must be Mother Helena! Now, use that
Zekir's Holy Stake on Kukulkannibal!

22018.「あら あなた。\n ずいぶん おかしなことを言いますのね。: Oh, my dear. You say the strangest things.

22019.「……魔物の気配なんて\n 一切 しないではありませんか。: There was no sign of any monster.

22021.「だって ここにいるのは……\n 私に話しかけた あなたと <cs_pchero:
Because here you are... you and <cs_pchero>
talking to me. Just a hint of a few others...

22025.「ずっと 会いたかったですよ。\n ドゥラ……。: I've missed you for a long time. Dura...

22027.「マ マザー・ヘレナ？ なぜ あなたが……。\n 早く…… 私を 封印してくれ…:
Mother Helena? Why don't you... quickly...
seal me up...

22029.「時間が……ない。やつの 意識が戻る前に……。\n 早く 封印を……:
There's no time. We have to seal it before it
comes to its senses.

22031.「かはァッ！ こノ身体……\n ドゥラの肉体ハ もう 使い物にならヌ……。\n:
Kaaah! This body, this body of Dura's, is no
longer of any use to me, and since it is no
longer of any use to me...

22035.「……マ マザー・ヘレナ。\n なぜだ……。なぜ あなたが ここにいる……。:
...Mother... Mother Helena. Why... why are you
here...

22036.「ゼキルの聖杭を 持ってきてくれたんだよ。\n でも ドゥラくん。これって どう:
He brought me Zekir's Holy Stake. But, Dura.
What does this mean? Explain it to me!

22037.「……私は この日のために 皆を あざむいた。\n 天魔クァバルナは 死後……\:
I mocked them all for this day. Kukulkannibal,
the demon, does not return from the underworld
to this world after his death.

22038.「やつは…… おのれの肉体が消滅する間際\n 誰かの身体に その魂を宿し\n 永:
He... will, just as his body is about to be
annihilated, take up his soul in someone
else's body and live on forever...

22039.「それが やつの呪いだった……。\n 私は クァバルナの 死に際の一撃によって\:
It was his curse... a curse that I had been
infected with by Quavarna's dying blow...

22040.「私の身体で…… この絶望の連鎖を\n 断ち切ろうとしたのに……。\n あろうこ:
With my own body I tried to break this chain
of despair, but of course, the curse was on
Mother Helena...

22042.「マザー・ヘレナ……？\n やめろ……。何をするつもりだ……！:
Mother Helena...? Stop... what you're
doing...!

22043.「……ドゥラ。\n あなたは やっぱり 心の優しい子。\n 昔と ちっとも変わっ:
...Dura. You are still the same kind-hearted
girl. You haven't changed a bit.

22044.「いつも そうやって\n 自分を犠牲にして みんなを守ろうとする……。:
Always trying to protect everyone else at the
expense of yourself...

22045.「そう。あのときと同じ……。\n おなかを空かせた子に 自分のパンを\n 分けあ:
That's right. Just like that time... when you
shared your Bread with a hungry child.

22046.「それが わかっただけでも 私は嬉しいわ。\n ありがとう ドゥラ……。:
Just knowing that makes me happy. Thank you,
Dura...

22052.「……<cs_pchero>さん。\n ボクたちは ドゥラくんを連れて\n 一度:
...<cs_pchero>. We are going back to Dolworm
with Mr. Dura.

22053.「ドルワームで また お会いしましょう。\n それでは……。: See you again at Dolworm. Well then...
